mapper.select: SELECT companyName, companyRating, minPrice, companyReviewCnt, companyImageUrl FROM company INNER JOIN reservation r on company.companyIdx = r.companyIdx INNER JOIN companyimagelist c on company.companyIdx = c.companyIdx GROUP BY c.companyIdx HAVING COUNT(companyName) >= 0 ORDER BY COUNT(companyName) DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT companyName, companyRating, minPrice, companyReviewCnt, companyImageUrl FROM company INNER JOIN companyimagelist c on company.companyIdx = c.companyIdx INNER JOIN likelist l on company.companyIdx = l.companyIdx GROUP BY l.companyIdx HAVING COUNT(l.companyIdx) > 0 ORDER BY COUNT(l.companyIdx) DESC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT companyName, companyRating, companyReviewCnt, availTimeStart, minPrice, category, companyImageUrl FROM company INNER JOIN location l on company.locationIdx = l.locationIdx INNER JOIN companyimagelist c on company.companyIdx = c.companyIdx WHERE (l.cityInfo=#{searchCondition} OR l.provinceInfo=#{searchCondition});
